about_the_game: Numero is a libretro core for emulating the graphing calculators. It is based on the awesome Wabbitemu emulator. It allows you to play your games like never before in fullscreen and using a gamepad! You can also control it with a mouse or keyboard, or you can just use the virtual mouse for pressing the calculator buttons.
detailed_description: Numero is a libretro core for emulating the graphing calculators. It is based on the awesome Wabbitemu emulator. It allows you to play your games like never before in fullscreen and using a gamepad! You can also control it with a mouse or keyboard, or you can just use the virtual mouse for pressing the calculator buttons.
legal_notice:
RetroArch is free/open source software, available under the GNU GPL 3.0 license.

It does not contain any copyrighted material by third parties. RetroArch does not condone piracy in any way, shape or form.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel: At least Intel HD 4K required for OpenGL, any compliant D3D11 GPU for Direct3D 11. Should support at least Shader Model 3.0 and/or 4.0.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS El Capitan (10.11) or later

name: RetroArch - Numero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU and driver that supports OpenGL v2.0 or higher
  • Additional Notes: For OpenGL: Intel HD 2K/3K GPUs on Windows 10 will have to fall back to an OpenGL 1.1 driver.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel: At least Intel HD 4K required for OpenGL, any compliant D3D11 GPU for Direct3D 11. Should support at least Shader Model 3.0 and/or 4.0.
  • Additional Notes: For OpenGL: Intel HD 2K/3K GPUs on Windows 10 will have to fall back to an OpenGL 1.1 driver.

short_description: Numero is a libretro core for emulating the graphing calculators.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain
